creator: N/A
headline: N/A
abstract:
The scope of the platform is the modelling and the simulation of agro-ecosystems. Modelling and simulation are popular to better understand agro-ecosystems, to design new ones for specific purposes and to quickly analyze a large number of them in a variety of situations by virtual experiments. However, the development and use of these models require the involvement of several scientific disciplines such as agronomy, animal science, economics, statistics and computer science. This leads to a real trouble when integrating all the necessary components in the time dedicated to the modelling phase of a project, and very often by excessive specialization patterns around one aspect of the system. The platform aims to improve quality and efficiency of modelling, by providing convenient tools and by allowing better sharing and reuse of modelling works.
The platform provides different services: Software services to build and simulate models, a library of models, interoperability solutions, expertise on modelling projects and their management, training session, animation of modelers communities.
author: Philippe Clastre
name: RECORD modelling and simulating platform for agroecosystems
distributionInfo: Commission Regulation (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services
